articles.description: It's hard to find a loser in this battle of digital titans.
articles.content: Both Netflix(NASDAQ:NFLX) and Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN) are fantastic companies with bright futures. They've already created a ton of wealth for investors, and both have tons of growth left in their tanks… [+4979 chars]

articles.title: US carbon emissions fell 10% in 2020, because of the pandemic. It's up to Biden to stop them from bouncing back - CNN

articles.title: Small businesses can start applying for new PPP loans on Monday - CNN
